file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Payment schedule 1.0
  version: '1.0'
servers:
  - url: https://tbrws-s.hysing.is/rad/TBRIslandis.api.v1:paymentSchedule_v1
paths:
  /wagesdeduction/{nationalId}:
    get:
      operationId: wagesdeductionnationalId_GET_1
      parameters:
        - name: nationalId
          in: path
          description: National identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/wagesdeductionnationalId_GET_response'
            application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/wagesdeductionnationalId_GET_response'
        '401':
          description: Access Denied
          content: {}
    put:
      description: Set employer for input nationalid
      operationId: wagesdeductionnationalId_PUT_1
      parameters:
        - name: nationalId
          in: path
          description: National identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/input'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/input'
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/wagesdeductionnationalId_PUT_response'
            application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/wagesdeductionnationalId_PUT_response'
        '401':
          description: Access Denied
          content: {}
      x-codegen-request-body-name: input
    post:
      description: Set employer for input nationalid
      operationId: wagesdeductionnationalId_POST_1
      parameters:
        - name: nationalId
          in: path
          description: National identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/input'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/input'
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/wagesdeductionnationalId_POST_response'
            application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/wagesdeductionnationalId_POST_response'
        '204':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/wagesdeductionnationalId_POST_response'
            application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/wagesdeductionnationalId_POST_response'
        '401':
          description: Access Denied
          content: {}
      x-codegen-request-body-name: input
  /debtsandschedules/{nationalId}:
    get:
      operationId: debtsandschedulesnationalId_GET_2
      parameters:
        - name: nationalId
          in: path
          description: National identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/debtsandschedulesnationalId_GET_response'
            application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/debtsandschedulesnationalId_GET_response'
        '401':
          description: Access Denied
          content: {}
  /conditions/{nationalId}:
    get:
      description: Returns current condidtion for given nationalId.
      operationId: conditionsnationalId_GET_3
      parameters:
        - name: nationalId
          in: path
          description: National identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/conditionsnationalId_GET_response'
            application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/conditionsnationalId_GET_response'
        '401':
          description: Access Denied
          content: {}
  /distributionInitialPosition/{nationalId}/{scheduleType}:
    get:
      operationId: distributionInitialPositionnationalIdscheduleType_GET_4
      parameters:
        - name: nationalId
          in: path
          description: National identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: scheduleType
          in: path
          description: schedule type
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: totalAmount
          in: query
          description: 'total due amount '
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: disposableIncome
          in: query
          description: disposable income amount
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/distributionInitialPositionnationalIdscheduleType_GET_response'
            application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/distributionInitialPositionnationalIdscheduleType_GET_response'
        '401':
          description: Access Denied
          content: {}
  /paymentDistribution/{nationalId}/{scheduleType}:
    get:
      operationId: paymentDistributionnationalIdscheduleType_GET_5
      parameters:
        - name: nationalId
          in: path
          description: National identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: scheduleType
          in: path
          description: schedule type
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: totalAmount
          in: query
          description: 'total due amount '
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: monthAmount
          in: query
          description: disposable income amount
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: monthCount
          in: query
          description: disposable income amount
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/paymentDistributionnationalIdscheduleType_GET_response'
            application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/paymentDistributionnationalIdscheduleType_GET_response'
        '401':
          description: Access Denied
          content: {}
  /schedules:
    post:
      description: store  schedules , return 201 if ok
      operationId: schedules_POST_6
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/inputSchedules'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/inputSchedules'
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/schedules_POST_response'
            application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/schedules_POST_response'
        '401':
          description: Access Denied
          content: {}
      x-codegen-request-body-name: inputSchedules
components:
  schemas:
    DebtsAndSchedules_DT:
      required:
        - chargetypes
        - explanation
        - nationalId
        - organization
        - paymentSchedule
        - totalAmount
        - type
      type: object
      properties:
        totalAmount:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        nationalId:
          type: string
          description: National identifier
        chargetypes:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ChargeTypes_DT'
        organization:
          type: string
        paymentSchedule:
          type: string
        type:
          type: string
        explanation:
          type: string
    errors:
      required:
        - detail
        - title
      type: object
      properties:
        traceId:
          type: string
        param:
          type: string
        detail:
          type: string
        type:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
    Payments_DT:
      required:
        - accumulated
        - dueDate
        - payment
      type: object
      properties:
        dueDate:
          type: string
          description: due date
        payment:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        accumulated:
          type: integer
          description: accumulated
          format: int64
    SchedulesInput_DT:
      required:
        - email
        - nationalId
        - phoneNumber
        - schedules
      type: object
      properties:
        phoneNumber:
          type: string
          description: Phone number
        nationalId:
          type: string
          description: Icelandic nationalID
        schedules:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/schedules'
        email:
          type: string
          description: e-mail
    WagesDetuction_DT:
      required:
        - employerName
        - employerNationalId
      type: object
      properties:
        employerName:
          type: string
        employerNationalId:
          type: string
          description: Employer national id
    schedules_POST_response:
      type: object
      properties:
        error:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails_DT'
    payments:
      required:
        - accumulated
        - duedate
        - payment
      type: object
      properties:
        duedate:
          type: string
        payment:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        accumulated:
          type: integer
          format: int64
    debtsandschedulesnationalId_GET_response:
      required:
        - deptAndSchedules
      type: object
      properties:
        deptAndSchedules:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/DebtsAndSchedules_DT'
        error:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails_DT'
    input:
      required:
        - employer
      type: object
      properties:
        employer:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/employer'
    schedules:
      required:
        - chargeTypes
        - organizationID
        - payments
        - type
      type: object
      properties:
        organizationID:
          type: string
        payments:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/payments'
        chargeTypes:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/chargeTypes'
        type:
          type: string
          description: schedule type
    wagesdeductionnationalId_PUT_response:
      type: object
      properties:
        error:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails_DT'
    inputSchedules:
      required:
        - ServiceInput
      type: object
      properties:
        ServiceInput:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/SchedulesInput_DT'
    ChargeTypes_DT:
      required:
        - expenses
        - id
        - intrest
        - name
        - principal
        - total
      type: object
      properties:
        principal:
          type: number
          format: double
        total:
          type: number
          format: double
        name:
          type: string
        intrest:
          type: number
          format: double
        id:
          type: string
        expenses:
          type: number
          format: double
    conditionsnationalId_GET_response:
      type: object
      properties:
        conditions:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Conditions_DT'
        error:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails_DT'
    paymentDistributionnationalIdscheduleType_GET_response:
      required:
        - paymentDistribution
      type: object
      properties:
        error:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails_DT'
        paymentDistribution:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/paymentDistribution_DT'
    wagesdeductionnationalId_GET_response:
      required:
        - wagesDeduction
      type: object
      properties:
        wagesDeduction:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/WagesDetuction_DT'
        error:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails_DT'
    employer:
      required:
        - employerNationalId
      type: object
      properties:
        employerNationalId:
          type: string
          description: Employer national identifier
    wagesdeductionnationalId_POST_response:
      type: object
      properties:
        error:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails_DT'
    distributionInitialPositionnationalIdscheduleType_GET_response:
      required:
        - distributionInitialPosition
      type: object
      properties:
        distributionInitialPosition:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/DistributionInitialPosition_DT'
        error:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails_DT'
    Conditions_DT:
      required:
        - accommodationTaxReturns
        - alimony
        - citReturns
        - collectionActions
        - disposableIncome
        - doNotOwe
        - maxDebt
        - maxDebtAmount
        - maxPayment
        - minPayment
        - minWagePayment
        - nationalId
        - oweTaxes
        - percent
        - taxReturns
        - totalDebtAmount
        - vatReturns
        - wageReturns
        - withholdingTaxReturns
      type: object
      properties:
        doNotOwe:
          type: boolean
        collectionActions:
          type: boolean
        citReturns:
          type: boolean
        totalDebtAmount:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        alimony:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        taxReturns:
          type: boolean
        percent:
          type: string
        minWagePayment:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        wageReturns:
          type: boolean
        disposableIncome:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        withholdingTaxReturns:
          type: boolean
        oweTaxes:
          type: boolean
          description: true if taxes are owed
        nationalId:
          type: string
          description: National identifier
        maxPayment:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        minPayment:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        vatReturns:
          type: boolean
        maxDebtAmount:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        accommodationTaxReturns:
          type: boolean
        maxDebt:
          type: boolean
    ProblemDetails_DT:
      required:
        - detail
        - status
        - title
      type: object
      properties:
        instance:
          type: string
          description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.
        detail:
          type: string
          description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
        type:
          type: string
          description: A URI reference [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type. This specification encourages that, when dereferenced, it provide human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML [W3C.REC-html5-20141028]). When this member is not present, its value is assumed to be "about:blank".
        title:
          type: string
          description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization(e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see[RFC7231], Section 3.4).
        errors:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/errors'
        status:
          type: string
          description: The HTTP status code([RFC7231], Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.
    DistributionInitialPosition_DT:
      required:
        - maxCountMonth
        - maxPayment
        - minCountMonth
        - minPayment
        - nationalId
        - scheduleType
      type: object
      properties:
        nationalId:
          type: string
          description: National identifier
        scheduleType:
          type: string
          description: schedule type
        maxPayment:
          type: integer
          description: max payment
          format: int64
        minPayment:
          type: integer
          description: min Payment
          format: int64
        minCountMonth:
          type: integer
          description: month min count
          format: int64
        maxCountMonth:
          type: integer
          description: month max count
          format: int64
    chargeTypes:
      required:
        - chargeID
      type: object
      properties:
        chargeID:
          type: string
    paymentDistribution_DT:
      required:
        - nationalId
        - payments
        - scheduleType
      type: object
      properties:
        nationalId:
          type: string
          description: National identifier
        scheduleType:
          type: string
          description: schedule type
        payments:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Payments_DT'

Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/schedules": post: requestBody: contents: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: form parameter "ServiceInput": field "Schedules": nested arrays not allowed
